title: How to learn to write professional letters - Quora

response.answer_text: Get hold of those secretarial typewriting workbooks published by the major secretarial course providers like Pitman's Institute, Gregg's, etc. These are the material used for training up generations of secretaries for more than a hundred years. The workbooks contain many of the established formats and phraseology of business letters for many types of business situations. The aim of them is to help users learn the ropes through familiarity and diffusion.
